Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: Ninja Masters of America
 

--- Michael Youngblood <warrior02@...> wrote:

> Actually it was a kid who wrote it, and has been in
> and out of the courts
> for quite a while to ban his website and erase the
> material that is on it,
> but he is protected from the first amendment so they
> cannot stop his website
>  
> 
> He is even the author of a book. at the time he was
> 13 years old. His book
> is even banned in some states, cities, and book
> stores. I actually saw the
> book in a book store and I peeked into it for a bit,
> and laughed at it.
> there is not one speck of real Ninpo in the entire
> book. now I read that he
> was found not guilty he hugged the woman that was
> suing him, and then pulled
> down his pants and defecated on the floor on the way
> out of court saying 
> that is real ultimate power" and vanished. Now I do
> not know if that is true
> or not but it seems to be in news sites including
> CNN..
> 
> Mike

Hmm. Not sure I buy the last part. I'd think that he
wouldn't exactly be allowed to "vanish" after
defecating on the floor of a court room, but maybe he
used his magic ninja powers. If you could find a link
or two, I'd be interested.
